title: Friday Roundup: Win a Caletti Out of the Ashes, Swift Human Errors, Definitive Stages & more!
content:
Help rebuild Santa Cruz trails & win a custom Caletti – Santa Cruz Mountains Trail Stewardship is raising money to rebuild Out of the Ashes with a new Caletti giveaway. Working to rebuild trails affected by the recent CZU Lighting Complex Fires, they are giving away a fully custom Caletti and a beautiful hand-crafted coffee table. […]

The post Friday Roundup: Win a Caletti Out of the Ashes, Swift Human Errors, Definitive Stages & more! appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
